'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

##  Background

A stretch of barely explored islands to the northwest of the Deadfire, given a wide berth by the majority of kith with a good sense of self-preservation. It represents the northern end of the [Magran's Teeth](/magransTeeth/) mountain chain.

## Points of interest

###### Main

[75px](/fileIconMountainRidgePng/) '''[Kohopa's Fang](/kohopasFang/)''': Located further north, which can be scaled to encounter naga - and if you're unlucky with your grenade throw, plenty of bats. The naga sorcerer drops the [Sungrazer](/sungrazer/).<br clear="left" />
[75px](/fileIconTheCrystalDesertPng/) '''[The Crystal Desert](/theCrystalDesert/)''': On the island to the north, home to [Belranga](/belranga/), the Crystal Empress - the first megaboss battle added to the game. Sail far in the other direction if you know what's good for you!<br clear="left" />
[75px](/fileIconCliffsPng/) '''Sun-scorched Valley''': A valley to the south, containing a group of [eoten](/eoten/) lounging among the rocks. You can observe them, attack, or use abilities to sneak up and wipe them out.

###### Others

* There's a shipwreck on the reef leading within Magran's Teeth.
* A [plagued ship](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMapExploration/) sits west of The Crystal Desert.
* Flotsam is scattered around this area, presumably as a result of the various shipwrecks.
